entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
